process.title: Making my imagination work is my nind√¥
process.presentation: For many years, I have dedicated my efforts to developing reliable digital solutions, which has allowed me to establish myself as a full-stack developer. My time at Epitech provided me with in-depth training in problem-solving and expertise in programming across a variety of languages and diverse projects. Additionally, my unique background has equipped me with significant experience in graphic design, defining me as a creative coder, far beyond the traditional role of a web integrator.

conception.title: Conception
conception.description: Do you have an ambitious project? Do you need an MVP? With my graphic sensitivity, I can design modern mockups with an effective UI/UX, as well as address unique projects (including 3D integration, for example), while advising you on the feasibility of your ideas.

development.title: Development
development.description: Whether it is for a website, a mobile application, or even a software solution, I can identify the latest and most appropriate technologies for your project. I prioritize an approach that values quality and scalability.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: I offer a complete deployment service to ensure the proper launch and optimal functioning of your solution. I handle hosting, server configuration, performance optimization, security, and manage all technical aspects.
